name: Strong and Stable
description:
Only you can save the British political class!

Help the ragtag team of underdogs that is running the country achieve their political goals, through tamagotchi-style management gameplay.

Provide them with enough Public Appearances, dodge public embarrassments, and clean up their poop in this exciting quest to complete the Great Political Project!

(Game available for download, for a slightly more optimised experience)

Game by Petter Vilberg
Music by Thomas Skuggevik

Additional freesound.com sounds by:
* BerlinGameScene.com
* ephemeral-rift
* elliottmoo
* http://www.youtube.com/user/freeAudiosounds
* lebaston100
* timbre
